sourcesContent:
<template>
    <!-- gradient="to top right, rgba(19, 84, 122, .5), rgba(19, 84, 122, .8)" -->
    <v-card outlined tile>
        <v-img
            src="@/assets/entrepreneur.jpg"
            class="d-flex fill-height justify-center text-center align-center text-h4 font-weight-bold white--text">
            <!-- <v-row class="fill-height justify-center align-center text-h4 font-weight-bold white--text"> -->
            {{ plan.name }}
            <!-- </v-row> -->
        </v-img>
        <v-card-text>
            <v-textarea
                label="Plan Description"
                class="mt-6 mb-8 ma-0 rounded-0"
                outlined
                hide-details
                readonly
                :value=plan.description>
            </v-textarea>

        </v-card-text>
        <v-card-actions class="justify-center">
            <v-btn
                class="mb-8 px-10 primary rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                dark
                @click="openDialog(plan.id)"
                depressed>
                Edit Plan
            </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>

        <v-divider class="mx-8"></v-divider>

        <v-card-actions class="justify-center">
            <v-btn
                class="mb-8 px-2 secondary darken-3 rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                depressed>
                View Plan Details
            </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import PlanEditDialog from '@/components/dialogs/PlanEditDialog'

export default {
    name: 'PlanCardShow',
    props: {
        plan: Object,
        editId: Number,
    },
    components: {
        PlanEditDialog,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            toggleEditPlan: false,
            displayMenu: false,
        }
    },
    methods: {
        openDialog(planId) {
            this.$emit("open-dialog");
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
.v-text-field--outlined>>>fieldset {
    border: 1px solid lightgray !important;
}
</style>
